str2: Or, than. A primary particle of distinction between two connected terms; disjunctive, or; comparative, than.
Three. Or neuter tria a primary number; 'three'.
From a compound of pro and phemi; a foreteller; by analogy, an inspired speaker; by extension, a poet.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: A prolonged form of an otherwise obsolete verb; to talk, i.e. Utter words.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Other, another (of more than two), different. A primary word; 'else, ' i.e. Different.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From dia and krino; to separate thoroughly, i.e. to withdraw from, or oppose; figuratively, to discriminate, or hesitate.
